DOC.brief_title: Patient Registry European Friedreich 's Ataxia Consortium Translational Studies ( EFACTS )
DOC.detailed_description: The EFACTS patient registry integrate prospectively systematically collected clinical research data ( e.g . clinical test , demographical characteristic ) access biological specimen ( e.g . blood , urine ) obtain individual genetically confirm FRDA unrelated control research participant . The EFACTS patient registry start 4-year study currently run without set end date . Eligible subject assess annual study visit clinical symptom sign disease . At study visit , general clinical , motor function , cognitive , Quality Life assessment administer . In addition , participant provide bio sample purpose genetic test research identify valuable biomarkers FRDA . Biological specimens clinical data make available qualified scientist within EFACTS network whose project review approved EFACTS Steering Committee . Research project aim advance scientific knowledge towards establish clinically effective treatment delay onset and/or slow progression disease .
